Package ohos.bluetooth.ble

Class BlePeripheralManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bluetooth.ble.BlePeripheralManager

  • public class BlePeripheralManager
extends Object
    Provides a Bluetooth GATT server for managing BLE peripheral devices.

    Your application can use this class to create BLE services and characteristics.

    Since:
    3

      A constructor used to create a BlePeripheralManager instance.

      • addService

        public boolean addService​(GattService service)
        Adds a specified service to be hosted.

        The added service and its characteristics are provided by the local device.

        Parameters:
        service - Indicates the service to add.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the service is added; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getDevicesByStates

        public List<BlePeripheralDevice> getDevicesByStates​(int[] states)
        Obtains the list of BLE peripheral devices in a specified state.
        Parameters:
        states - Indicates the specified state.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of BLE peripheral devices in the specified state.
        Since:
        3

      • notifyCharacteristicChanged

        public boolean notifyCharacteristicChanged​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                                           GattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                           boolean confirm)
        Sends a notification or indication of a change in a specified local characteristic.

        This method should be called for every BLE peripheral device that has requested notifications or indications.

        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device to receive the notification or indication.
        characteristic - Indicates the local characteristic that has changed.
        confirm - Specifies whether to request confirmation from the BLE peripheral device (indication) or send a notification. Value true indicates the former and false indicates the latter.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the notification or indication is sent successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • removeGattService

        public boolean removeGattService​(GattService service)
        Removes a specified service from the list of GATT services provided by this device.
        Parameters:
        service - Indicates the service to remove.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the service is removed; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • sendResponse

        public boolean sendResponse​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                            int requestId,
                            int status,
                            int offset,
                            byte[] value)
        Sends a response to a specified read or write request to a given BLE peripheral device.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device to which to send the response.
        requestId - Indicates the ID of the read or write request.
        status - Indicates the status of the read or write request.
        offset - Indicates the offset for a partial read or write response.
        value - Indicates the attribute value that was read or written.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the response is sent successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
